00043 #ifndef _orxPROFILER_H_
00044 #define _orxPROFILER_H_
00045

00047 #include "orxInclude.h"
00048 
00049 
00050 #ifdef __orxDEBUG__
00051 
00052   #define __orxPROFILER__
00053 
00054 #endif /* __orxDEBUG__ */
00055 
00056 
00059 #ifdef __orxPROFILER__
00060 
00061   #define orxPROFILER_PUSH_MARKER(NAME)                 \
00062   do                                                    \
00063   {                                                     \
00064     static orxS32 s32ProfilerID = -1;                   \
00065                                                         \
00066     if(s32ProfilerID < 0)                               \
00067     {                                                   \
00068       s32ProfilerID = orxProfiler_GetIDFromName(NAME);  \
00069     }                                                   \
00070                                                         \
00071     orxProfiler_PushMarker(s32ProfilerID, orxFALSE);    \
00072   } while(orxFALSE)
00073 
00074   #define orxPROFILER_PUSH_UNIQUE_MARKER(NAME)          \
00075   do                                                    \
00076   {                                                     \
00077     static orxS32 s32ProfilerID = -1;                   \
00078                                                         \
00079     if(s32ProfilerID < 0)                               \
00080     {                                                   \
00081       s32ProfilerID = orxProfiler_GetIDFromName(NAME);  \
00082     }                                                   \
00083                                                         \
00084     orxProfiler_PushMarker(s32ProfilerID, orxTRUE);     \
00085   } while(orxFALSE)
00086 
00087   #define orxPROFILER_POP_MARKER()                  orxProfiler_PopMarker();
00088 
00089 #else /* __orxPROFILER__ */
00090 
00091   #define orxPROFILER_PUSH_MARKER(NAME)
00092 
00093   #define orxPROFILER_PUSH_UNIQUE_MARKER(NAME)
00094 
00095   #define orxPROFILER_POP_MARKER()
00096 
00097 #endif /* __orxPROFILER__ */
00098
